title: Karma bugfix in 5.5     Can someone reword this or explain it to me.
body:
E - Defiance (Mantra)
BUGFIX Fixed a bug where allied champions were granted the inspire portion of the shield, instead of half of the defiance damage 

What does this mean, i am confused by it. does it mean allys are not being granted the correct size shield or was damage not radiating properly?

replies.body: Reading the abilities description and the bugfix description I'd guess the nearby allies were getting the shield value of inspire [80/120/160/200/240 (+50% Ability Power)] rather than half the damage value of defiance (the mantra buff of inspire) [60/140/220/300 (+60% Ability Power)] as a shield.
